mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where class_num=#{class_num} and ml_num=#{ml_num}
mapper.select: select * from wishlist where ml_num=#{ml_num} and class_num=#{class_num}

select i.class_num,i.class_title,i.class_form,i.class_price,s.sloc_name,c.cover_num,IFNULL( ( select round((avg(curr_rating) + avg(ready_rating) + avg(kind_rating) + avg(time_rating))/4,1) class_rating from class_review group by class_num having class_num=i.class_num),0 ) class_rating from class_info i, ( select * from wishlist where ml_num=#{ml_num} ) wish, small_location s, ( SELECT class_num , cover_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY class_num ORDER BY cover_regdate DESC) cnt FROM class_img ) c where wish.class_num=i.class_num and s.sloc_num=i.sloc_num and c.class_num=wish.class_num and cnt = 1 and i.class_status!=2 order by wish.wish_regdate limit #{startRow},2
